TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComImportAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ComImportAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ComImportAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示 COM 中之前已定義屬性化類型。

span.span: Indicates that the attributed type was previously defined in COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以將此屬性套用至類別或介面，雖然[Tlbimp.exe （類型程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)通常會套用它為您匯入類型程式庫時。You can apply this attribute to classes or interfaces, although the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) typically applies it for you when it imports a type library. 是虛擬的自訂屬性，指出先前已發行的類型程式庫中，已定義型別。 is a pseudo-custom attribute that indicates that a type has been defined in a previously published type library. Common language runtime 會將這些型別只有在啟用時以不同的方式、 匯出、 強制型轉、 等等。The common language runtime treats these types differently when activating, exporting, coercing, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 所有受管理的物件會繼承的基底 COM 類型必須彙總可用執行緒封送處理器 (FTM)。All base COM types that are inherited by a managed object must aggregate the Free Threaded Marshaller (FTM). 不會彙總的 FTM 的 COM 型別無法繼承由受管理的物件。COM types that do not aggregate the FTM can't be inherited by managed objects. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用managed 的介面宣告。The following example demonstrates how to apply the to a managed interface declaration. 您在原始程式碼中，手動產生 interop 組件時，才會套用這個屬性，而且想要模擬 Tlbimp.exe 所產生的中繼資料。You apply this attribute only when generating an interop assembly manually in source code, and want to simulate the metadata produced by Tlbimp.exe. [!code-cpp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CPP/codefile2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CS/codefile2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/VB/codefile2.vb#2)]
